column5: Forecast was for about 10 cm here in Stouffville.  Weatherman just as bad in winter as he is in summers it seems.  Stay out of the ditch Peter
Storms can dissipate and intensify.  Don't give the weather people a hard time.  If you understand weather It's very difficult to predict exact forecasts lol.  Enjoy the snow!
With your title I thought it was going to be something else.  Bummer.  Just kidding
Bahahahahah!!!!! Ya, I was thinking "this aught to be good...... The secrets of the love guru REVEALED!"   Fishing forum.........
I was thinking ice thickness. LOL
I was going to reply to this but decided I might lose my posting privleges.
You guys rock. 10 inches is just the way it is for some of us. Would hate to put it thru a snowblower though
